Title: Days to Remember
Actors: Barbara Sukowa, Horst-Günter Marx, Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic, Rade Serbedzija
Plot: Katharina, a German journalist of Yugoslavian origin, comes to Podgorica to prepare a material for her TV-show. There she meets Peter, a young German, who came to Yugoslavia to make his own investigation about his father's Nazi past.
